form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Fischer (for herself and Ms. Cantwell) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To improve the Microloan Program of the Small Business Administration.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Microloan Act of 2015.

subsection.text: Section 7(m) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(m)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by redesignating subparagraph (F) as subparagraph (E); and
by striking Program and all that follows through Under the program authorized and inserting Number of participants.—Under the program authorized; and

subsection.text: It is the sense of Congress that the Administrator of the Small Business Administration should promote the Microloan Program under section 7(m) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(m)) to encourage entrepreneurs to use the program.
